body.name: Anti-Theft Video Doorbell Mount - No-Drill Solution for Apartment Doors, Ideal for Renters and Home Offices, Compatible with Most Video Doorbells

features: Wide Door Compatibility: Our video doorbell mount is compatible with various doors (excluding iron security doors). It is designed for inward-swinging doors with a thickness ranging from 0.59 to 2.36 inches and a door gap over 0.06 inch.

Enhanced Anti-Theft Design: The upgraded anti-theft design of our video doorbell mount provides comprehensive protection for your wireless video doorbell. It effectively safeguards your video doorbell camera from theft, ensuring the security of your property.

Easy No-Drill Installation: Installing our video doorbell mount is a breeze. Simply place your video doorbell into the mount's shell and secure it with the included sponge pads. Then attach the stainless steel doorbell mount holder using screws. Adjust the doorbell mount fixed clip to complete the installation on your home, apartment, office, or rental door. No drilling is required, making setup quick and hassle-free.

Versatile Doorbell Compatibility: The doorbell mount is designed to be compatible with most popular brands of video doorbells. It is a perfect fit for Blink Doorbell, Video Doorbell 1, Video Doorbell 2, Video Doorbell 3, Video Doorbell 3 Plus, and most of the video doorbell.

100% Satisfaction Guaranteed: Provide lifetime free return, free replacement, 24 hours prompt respond. If you are not satisfied with our products or have any problems, please contact with us, we will be here till your issue is solved.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I will not under rate
reviews.reviewText: It didn’t fit my generic door camera. I purchased this because it was cheaper and worth the risk. So purchase for name brand products only. Search “generic door camera mount” for generic brand cameras. Get a camera mount that height adjust. This might not work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Needed a Ring doorbell holder so I would not have to drill into the door. Works well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Didn’t let my doorbell function properly
reviews.reviewText: Didn’t actually diligently the product. It was easy to assemble but my ring doorbell would not function while in the anti thief ring doorbell holder.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No disassembly required to charge!
reviews.reviewText: So i was hesitant about purchasing this with only 11 reviews but when the product came, i was beyond satisfied! Instructions were a little basic so some thinking had to go into it, but the fact that it went together solid, and with the ability to charge it without removing the assembly, i was extremely satisfied with the mount. When i get another doorbell, you better believe i will be getting another one of these. Thanks so much for a great product, i hope this encourages people to purchase if they are on the fence about it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars exposed security screw
reviews.reviewText: product looks good. compact but solid. The only thing is the security screw is exposed and on the outside (bottom of the case). If the security screw is loosed, the case can just slide down and open. I would strongly prefer if the screw is not exposed, and people cannot remove the case without open the door first.update (12/11/2023) - the seller contacted after reading my review and wanted to learn about exactly what my concern is, and promise to take care of it. It is great to know a seller truly care about their product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This works exactly as intended. No damage to the door and I can still see everything I did before when it was nailed.

reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Muy útil ,pero hay un pequeño detalle ….☝️
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. La parte metálica que va sujeta a la puerta es demasiado gruesa ,así que tuve que quitarle el metal porque entonces mi puerta no cerraba .De todos modos el ladrón (días atrás intentaron robarse el timbre ) no lo pudo lograr .Aunque le quité esa parte importante ,sigue cumpliendo su función ….Es por esto que solo le estoy dando 4 estrellas ,de lo contrario obtendría 10!
